name: MechaPunk
description:
Game name : MechaPunk

This Game was Demo for university project.  

Credit 

Programmer Coding : Chetsadaphon Intarapimai 

Art Design / Game Design : Tanaphat Jiradesdomrong 

Level Design / Background Design: Pakawat Karnchanakomol 

Sound: Thakool Sripraram 

How to Play? 

 [] Mouse

 -Use Left mouse button (LMB) to click 

Gameplay 

-You need to upgrade your heroes to beat the boss. and every stage the boss will increase it HP.

 -when you reach stage 100+ you can use rebirth button on the left bottom to restart from stage 1 with permanent relic point which can help boost your damage in the later run 

-when reach stage 1000+ while you upgrade your heroes it have a chance to fail and make your heroes die then you need to click rebirth to reset your game and start from stage 1. 

Have Fun!!
